an9.7:2.3: These “impossibilities” are mentioned in a few suttas. However none of them are at Rajagaha, so the provenance of this sutta and the next are unclear. At MN 76 the five are taught to Sandaka at Kosambi. At DN 29 the nine (of this sutta, not the next) are taught to Cunda in the Sakyan country. And at DN 33 the five are taught by Sariputta at Pava.
